articles.title: Regional health organization issues alert as measles cases surge across the Americas - AP News
articles.description: The Pan American Health Organization has issued an alert due to a surge in measles cases across the Americas, with Mexico reporting the highest numbers. PAHO highlighted that 78% of recent cases involved unvaccinated people and urged for urgent vaccination ca…
articles.content: MEXICO CITY (AP) The Pan American Health Organization, PAHO, issued a new epidemiological alert following a surge of measles cases across the Americas, with Mexico reporting the highest numbers. It a… [+2597 chars]
